about_the_game:
The Level Limit Breach 3 DLC includes 3 items where all party members' max level is increased by 100.

The Level Limit Breach 3 includes:

・Limit Breaker Potion 7
・Limit Breaker Potion 8
・Limit Breaker Potion 9
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 シリーズ
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) 互換サウンドカード
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11対応)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290、か以上
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) 互換サウンドカード
